Heboh Dana Lem Aibon dan Pulpen Pemprov DKI, Menkeu Buka 'Jalur Penelusuran'
01 Nov 2019, 18:31 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Heboh Dana Lem Aibon dan Pulpen Pemprov DKI, Menkeu Buka 'Jalur Penelusuran'

KBRN, Jakarta : Heboh anggaran Dinas Pendidikan (Disdik) Pemerintah Provinsi (Pemprov) DKI Jakarta untuk pembelian lem Aica Aibon senilai Rp 82,8 miliar, ternyata menarik perhatian Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) RI Sri Mulyani Indrawati. Bukan itu saja anggaran heboh tersebut, akan tetapi muncul juga pembelian ballpoint Rp 124 miliar. Semua itu masuk di Rencana Kebijakan Umum Anggaran Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) DKI Jakarta 2020. Menanggapi hal itu, Menkeu akan membuka koordinasi dengan Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) untuk membicarakan dana tak masuk akal tersebut."Kami (Kemenkeu) akan bekerja sama dengan Kementerian Dalam Negeri untuk meningkatkan kualitas APBN tentunya dan berbagai hal lain yang harus dikoordinasikan," sebut Menkeu Sri Mulyani Indrawati kepada wartawan di Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Sebelumnya, mantan Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Djarot Syaiful Hidayat juga menanggapi perihal anggaran luar biasa Pemprov DKI tersebut. "Ini sebetulnya terbukti betapa pentingnya elektronik budgeting (e-budgeting), pentingnya transparansi dengan terbuka seperti ini. Bukan hanya anggota dewan yang bisa menyisir anggaran dan mencermatinya tapi masyarakat juga bisa melihat," terang Djarot yang juga Anggota DPR RI Komisi II Fraksi PDI Perjuangan, Djarot Syaiful Hidayat di Kompleks Parlemen Senayan Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019).Djarot lanjut menuturkan, kejadian terkuaknya anggaran 'siluman' soal lem Aibon dan ballpoint bernilai ratusan miliar rupiah tersebut bukan semata kesalahan Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan. Siapapun bisa melacak siapa orang yang input atau memasukkan laporan itu ke e-budgeting. Dan mengenai apakah sengaja atau tidak, bisa ditelusuri."Kalau tidak sengaja itu bodoh sekali, karena tentunya ada faktor kesengajaan. Kalau saya, tinggal panggil saja tanya supaya terbukti. Kalau sudah terbukti, ya sudah selesaikan. (Langsung) Nonjok gitu," ujarnya.BACA JUGA: Anggaran Lem Aibon dan Pulpen Pemprov DKI, Djarot Syaiful : Bisa Diusut
Mantan Gubernur DKI Jakarta tersebut lantas menilai, dengan keterbukaan seperti saat ini, sebetulnya Pemprov lebih terbantu dan anggaran bisa tepat sasaran agar tidak lagi keluar anggaran aneh-aneh. Dia mengaku paham betul soal anggaran aneh-aneh itu. Kenapa demikian?"Saya tahu persis saat bersama Pak Ahok (memimpin Jakarta). Saya tahu persis bagaimana penyusupan-penyusupan anggaran itu, sehingga kami sempat bersitegang dengan DPRD kala itu. Akibatnya kami harus gunakan APBD tahun sebelumnya karena tidak mencapai kesepakatan (dengan DPRD)," imbuhnya.Saat bersama Basuki Tjahaja Purnama atau karib disapa Ahok memimpin Jakarta, kata dia, banyak sekali anggaran yang disusupi masuk (untuk Pemprov DKI Jakarta). Karena itulah dibuat e-budgeting, sehingga ada kunci, ada password, siapa saja yang masuk, bisa dilacak."Makanya kami buat e-budgeting. Itu betul-betul ada kunci, ada password, siapa yang bisa masuk bisa dilacak. Memang menyisir (kebocoran) anggaran itu tak bisa sempurna 100 persen. Tapi minimal bisa mengamankan supaya tidak bocor," pungkas Djarot.Sementara itu, Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan juga sudah mengklarifikasi polemik anggaran fantastis tersebut. Dia menyebutkan, hal itu lebih disebabkan kesalahan digital. Biasanya, Pemprov DKI mengunggah seluruh usulan anggaran dalam sistem elektronik APBD yang dapat diakses publik melalui website http://apbd.jakarta.go.id."Sebenarnya itu yang saya panggil minggu lalu. Saya tidak umumkan karena itu review internal. Ini ada problem sistem yaitu sistem digital tapi tidak smart. Ini sistem digital tapi masih mengandalkan manual (pemeriksaannya)," kata Anies di Jakarta, Rabu (30/10/2019).Mengapa Anies berkata demikian? Karena ia menilai, bahwa sistem input itu seharusnya bisa dilakukan dengan smart system. Jadi nantinya bisa melacak anggaran-anggaran yang salah input.

Splashy Funds from Aibon Lem and DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's Pens, Minister of Finance Opens 'Track'
01 Nov 2019, 18:31 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Splashy Funds from Aibon Lem and DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's Pens, Minister of Finance Opens 'Track'

KBRN, Jakarta: The chaotic budget of the DKI Jakarta Provincial Administration (Disdik) for the purchase of Aica Aibon glue worth Rp.82.8 billion, turned out to attract the attention of the Indonesian Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati. Not only that the splashy budget, but there was also a ballpoint purchase of Rp 124 billion. All of that is included in the 2020 DKI Jakarta Provisional Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) General Policy Plans. In response, the Minister of Finance will open coordination with the Minister of Home Affairs (Minister of Home Affairs) to discuss the unreasonable funds. "We (Ministry of Finance) will cooperating with the Ministry of Home Affairs to improve the quality of the state budget and of course various other things that must be coordinated, "said Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati to reporters in Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). Previously, former Jakarta Governor, Djarot Syaiful Hidayat also responding to the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's extraordinary budget. "This actually proves the importance of electronic budgeting (e-budgeting), the importance of transparency with openness like this. Not only members of the council can comb the budget and observe it but the public can also see," explained Djarot who is also a Member of the Republic of Indonesia DPR Commission II PDI Perjuangan faction Djarot Syaiful Hidayat at the Senayan Parliament Complex in Jakarta, Thursday (10/31/2019). Djarot further said that the 'stealth' budget issue about Aibon glue and a ballpoint worth hundreds of billions of rupiahs was not merely the fault of DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan. Anyone can track who inputted or submitted the report to e-budgeting. And about whether intentionally or not, can be traced. "If by accident it is very stupid, because of course there is a deliberate factor. If I do, just call it to ask to be proven. If it has been proven, it has been resolved. (Directly) Nonjok like that," he said . READ ALSO: DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's Aibon Glue and Pen Budget, Djarot Syaiful: Can Be Followed
The former Governor of DKI Jakarta then assessed, with openness as it is today, the provincial government is actually more helped and the budget can be right on target so that no more weird budget exits. He claimed to understand well about the strange budget. Why is that? "I know exactly when I was with Pak Ahok (leading Jakarta). I know exactly how the budget infiltration was, so we had a dispute with the DPRD at that time. As a result we had to use the previous year's budget because we did not reach agreement (with the DPRD) , "he added. When together with Basuki Tjahaja Purnama or close friend Ahok led Jakarta, he said, a lot of the budget was infiltrated in (for DKI Jakarta Provincial Government). That's why e-budgeting is made, so there is a key, there is a password, anyone who enters, can be tracked. "That's why we made e-budgeting. There really is a key, there is a password, anyone who can enter can be traced. leakage) The budget cannot be 100 percent perfect. But at least it can secure so that it does not leak, "concluded Djarot. Meanwhile, DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan also clarified the fantastic budget polemic. He said, it was more due to digital errors. Usually, the DKI Provincial Government uploads all budget proposals in the APBD electronic system that can be accessed publicly via the website http://apbd.jakarta.go.id. "Actually, that was what I called last week. I didn't announce it because it was an internal review. This has a problem. the system is a digital system but it is not smart. It is a digital system but still relies on manuals (inspection), "Anies said in Jakarta, Wednesday (10/30/2019). Why did Anies say that? Because he considered, that the input system should be done with a smart system. So later you can track the wrong input budgets.
